div.p:
The Livistonas shall later have my careful attention. The round-fruited is not L. Australis, but it may either be L. Mariae from Central Austr, or L. Alfredi from West-Australia. As you desired a plant to be named after Lord Kintore, this palm can be chosen for the purpose, should on careful study it be separable from the 2 mentioned Kindly write me soon full notes of it in contrast to your L. Leichhardti.
L. leichhardtii? I have rather good notes of L. Mariae & L. Alfredi already.
